name: Drag Them Out Into Space!
description:
COMPATIBLE WITH MOBILE!

Game idea made by students for the Trijam 115 GameJam.

In this game you need to throw away the asteroids that are falling dawn to your city! Drag them out into space and don't let them crush into the buildings. You can throw them sideways and upwards and even make them crash.

Controls

  • Left click to catch and drag an asteroid. Hold down the left click if you don't want to let it go. 
  • You can also play with touch in your mobile phone.

Tools used

  • Unity
  • Photoshop
  • Bfxr

Credits

  • Music
  • Explosion SFX

Ranking

#1 Apolok 5 stars no perfect #2 AleixFerre 5 stars no perfect

Hall of Fame
